readme:
### A Game-Changer in Dynamic Content Generation!

In a world where [Templated.io](http://Templated.io) and [ApiTemplate.io](http://ApiTemplate.io) charge between $29 to $179/month, we’re flipping the script…

### What if you could get all the power – for FREE?

We’re proud to introduce our N8N workflow, a modern, fast, and developer-friendly tool for generating dynamic images with $zero subscription fees.

No pricing tiers.  
No usage caps.  
No hidden fees.  
Just pure value – 100% free.

### How We Compare:

![1temp.png](https://n8niostorageaccount.blob.core.windows.net/n8nio-strapi-blobs-prod/assets/1temp_ddb4df2637.png)  
or  
![2temp.png](https://n8niostorageaccount.blob.core.windows.net/n8nio-strapi-blobs-prod/assets/2temp_f01f680f08.png)

But we are always **Free**

Note: Pricing is based on 2025-04-01 and the free imagekit plan.

### Why Free?

We believe that powerful tools should be accessible to everyone — startups, developers, creators, and students alike. Our mission is to empower you to create amazing things without breaking the bank.

### What is a template idea, and how can you build one? (With examples)

Follow this page to better understand everything. [Add overlays on images](https://imagekit.io/docs/add-overlays-on-images)

### Get Started in Seconds

No credit card. No trials. No limitations.  
Just sign up and start creating.

### What You Need

  * [n8n (Cloud or self-hosted).](https://n8n.partnerlinks.io/9x9vm7zdsihy)
  * [Imagekit just the FREE plan.](https://imagekit.io/registration?code=tim01225)



### How to Generate imagekit API

  1. After signing up, go to the ImageKit dashboard. On the left sidebar, scroll down until you find "Developer Options", then click on it.

  2. Choose your preferred method of integration – either API keys or Webhooks. In this case, we will proceed with the API option.

  3. On the right side of the screen, you will see your Private Key. This is the API key you'll need for your n8n workflow, along with code samples in different programming languages.

  4. For beginners: If you're not familiar with how to connect using the code from the previous step, simply visit this link: [Upload file V1](https://imagekit.io/docs/api-reference/upload-file/upload-file)

  5. On the right side of that page, enter your Private Key in the input field labeled "API Key", then click on the "Send API Request" button.

  6. Once the request is sent, scroll down to view the Shell/cURL code. From this code, copy only the part that looks like this:  
`--header 'Authorization: Basic ...'`  
and use it in your n8n workflow.




### N8N Workflow Setup

1- Import the workflow into n8n.

2- Add imagekit API.

3- Follow the instructions in the workflow.

4- Test & launch
readme_html:
A Game-Changer in Dynamic Content Generation!

In a world where Templated.io and ApiTemplate.io charge between $29 to $179/month, we’re flipping the script…

What if you could get all the power – for FREE?

We’re proud to introduce our N8N workflow, a modern, fast, and developer-friendly tool for generating dynamic images with $zero subscription fees.

No pricing tiers.
No usage caps.
No hidden fees.
Just pure value – 100% free.

How We Compare:


or

But we are always Free

Note: Pricing is based on 2025-04-01 and the free imagekit plan.

Why Free?

We believe that powerful tools should be accessible to everyone — startups, developers, creators, and students alike. Our mission is to empower you to create amazing things without breaking the bank.

What is a template idea, and how can you build one? (With examples)

Follow this page to better understand everything. Add overlays on images

Get Started in Seconds

No credit card. No trials. No limitations.
Just sign up and start creating.

What You Need

  • n8n (Cloud or self-hosted).
  • Imagekit just the FREE plan.

How to Generate imagekit API

  1. After signing up, go to the ImageKit dashboard. On the left sidebar, scroll down until you find "Developer Options", then click on it.

  2. Choose your preferred method of integration – either API keys or Webhooks. In this case, we will proceed with the API option.

  3. On the right side of the screen, you will see your Private Key. This is the API key you'll need for your n8n workflow, along with code samples in different programming languages.

  4. For beginners: If you're not familiar with how to connect using the code from the previous step, simply visit this link: Upload file V1

  5. On the right side of that page, enter your Private Key in the input field labeled "API Key", then click on the "Send API Request" button.

  6. Once the request is sent, scroll down to view the Shell/cURL code. From this code, copy only the part that looks like this:
    --header 'Authorization: Basic ...'
    and use it in your n8n workflow.

N8N Workflow Setup

1- Import the workflow into n8n.

2- Add imagekit API.

3- Follow the instructions in the workflow.

4- Test & launch
readme_zh:
### 动态内容生成的颠覆者！

当[Templated.io](http://Templated.io)和[ApiTemplate.io](http://ApiTemplate.io)每月收费29至179美元时，我们正在改写规则……

### 如果这一切功能都能免费获取呢？

我们自豪地推出N8N工作流——一个现代化、快速且开发者友好的动态图像生成工具，订阅费用为零。

无分级定价。  
无使用上限。  
无隐藏费用。  
纯粹的价值——100%免费。

### 对比优势：

![1temp.png](https://n8niostorageaccount.blob.core.windows.net/n8nio-strapi-blobs-prod/assets/1temp_ddb4df2637.png)  
或  
![2temp.png](https://n8niostorageaccount.blob.core.windows.net/n8nio-strapi-blobs-prod/assets/2temp_f01f680f08.png)

但我们始终**免费**

注：价格基于2025年4月1日及ImageKit免费套餐。

### 为何免费？

我们坚信强大工具应普惠所有人——初创企业、开发者、创作者和学生。我们的使命是让您无需破费即可创造非凡。

### 什么是模板创意？如何构建？（附案例）

通过此页面深入了解：[为图片添加叠加层](https://imagekit.io/docs/add-overlays-on-images)

### 秒速启程

无需信用卡。  
无需试用。  
无任何限制。  
注册即享创作自由。

### 所需准备

* [n8n（云端或自托管）](https://n8n.partnerlinks.io/9x9vm7zdsihy)  
* [ImageKit免费套餐](https://imagekit.io/registration?code=tim01225)  

### 生成ImageKit API指南

1. 注册后进入控制台，左侧导航栏找到"开发者选项"并点击  
2. 选择集成方式（API密钥或Webhook），本教程选用API  
3. 右侧可见"Private Key"，此密钥将用于n8n工作流，同时提供各语言代码示例  
4. 新手提示：若不知如何对接代码，访问[文件上传V1接口](https://imagekit.io/docs/api-reference/upload-file/upload-file)  
5. 在页面右侧"API Key"输入框填入Private Key，点击"发送API请求"  
6. 请求成功后，复制Shell/cURL代码中形如`--header 'Authorization: Basic ...'`的部分用于n8n工作流  

### N8N工作流配置

1. 导入工作流至n8n  
2. 添加ImageKit API  
3. 按工作流指引操作  
4. 测试并发布  

（注：保留英文品牌名及技术术语，采用中文技术文档常见句式结构，如"秒速启程"替代直译"快速开始"，"普惠"对应"accessible to everyone"。关键操作步骤使用数字序号+短句形式，符合中文技术指南阅读习惯。对比模块保留图片说明的简洁性，价格说明采用注释形式处理。）
title_zh: 使用ImageKit生成带文本与模板的动态图像。
